content: Hi, is there a way to delete a bundle of resources from Simplifier at once? I just can delete single resources one after the other.

Hi @Katarina, this isn't there yet, but under active development currently! For now deleting one-by-one is the only option, though if it is a very big set please send an email to simplifier@fire.ly with the details of the project, what you need deleted from it and we can do it behind the scenes instead.

Can you share how you ended up with this large set of resources you need deleted?
Also, here's a first look at how we are currently implementing the feature: BulkDelete.mp4. Your feedback would be welcome. We're implementing a more file-focused view to manage the files, the current Resources tab is more FHIR-resources and search oriented. You will be able to select-all, select one-by-one or shift-click to select a range of files.
This feature is now live. You can find it in your project under the Manage menu, then select "File Manager"
